records.Name: Reading to Kids at Vis Valley Elementary
records.Description__c:
It's our monthly trip to read books for the kindergartners again!

We'll take some of our favorite books...dress as yourselves!

records.Name: Animal Adoption Fair
records.Description__c: Help people find their next pet from the shelter...we need staff to welcome people, help them complete paperwork, take animals for microchipping, and maintain order

records.Name: Trail Maintenance
records.Description__c: We need 7 people for some outdoor work--trimming branches and vines and removing roots that might trip people on the local park trails
